description.p0: For the 7th edition of Belgium’s furry convention, our team would love to lure you into the intriguing Toxic City at the Bedford Hotel & Congress Center in Brussels.
description.p1: Let's bring everyone around and party under the neon lights! Beware of the toxic waste though: radioactivity is not a joke, and you never know what you can get close to…

dances.title: Dances
dances.description: Party hard at the dance where the DJs will be playing a nice selection of music. Whether you like House, Hardcore, Drum and bass, Dubstep, Techno or something else, our DJs have a beat to everybody's liking!

description.p0: Each year Flüüfff organises a variety of panels ranging from more serious informative ones such as the Furry Femme panel to more fun ones such as the Coffee panel!
description.p1: Of course a con is nothing without its attendees and they have shown interest in hosting their own panels too. Do you have some creative panels/activities in mind or do you want to share your enthusiasm about something you love or know a lot about? Make sure to submit your idea through the panel proposal form (as many did before you)!

show_night.title: Flüüfff Finale
show_night.description: With all this toxicity going on, we should lighten the mood... with our brand new Finale! By combining our previous Show Night with our Closing Ceremony, everyone will be able to spectate our fantastic show to end the convention on a high note. Want to show off your skills, bring some magic to the stage and/or put up a (comedy) show? If you want to host an act or performance, alone or with some friends, during our Finale, make sure to let us know by filling out our Act Proposal form!

description.p0: It’s a Belgian furry convention, located in Brussels! A furry convention is an event dedicated to anthropomorphic characters and a gathering place for all furries and their friends.
description.p1: Flüüfff is spread over 5 days, the 5th of November to the 9th of November 2025. The convention takes place in the Bedford hotel.

header.title: The most recent and hottest Flüüfff news!
header.subtitle: News

description.p0_fluufff: Flüüfff 2025 is the 7th edition of the Flüüfff convention. It is all about bringing furries together in one place to share friendship, fun, and creativity (values our community can be proud of). You don‘t have to be a furry to come party with us!
description.p1_contents: The convention lasts 5 days and can be enjoyed in many ways: dancing like a party animal, lounging, playing video-games and board-games, attend panels or participate in one of the proposed activities.

description.p0_furries: The furry fandom is a community inspired by anthropomorphic animals (animals with human traits). People who are part of the fandom are called 'furries'.
description.p1_fandom: You can compare it to other communities with a fanbase like the Star Wars, anime, or fantasy fandom. The furry fandom is mainly about creativity and is also known as a very social community.
description.p2_fursona: Most furries create their own character (also called fursona), based upon a certain animal. There are normal animals, hybrids, mythical creatures and some even create their own species.
description.p3_fursuits: If there’s a meetup or a convention, you could find some people wearing fursuits. These fursuits are mostly costumes based upon someone’s fursona. The fursuiters not only provide a hug, but also want to put a smile on the faces of children and adults alike.
description.p4_conventions: In the community and during conventions, it is all about making art, writing stories, roleplaying, socializing, and also making and wearing fursuits. Most furry conventions and several furry community groups collect money or organize panels for various charities!

help.description: Of course! You can contact us by email through our contact form and we’ll look into it, but the best way to support the Flüüfff is simply to attend it!
help.title: Can I help with Flüüfff 2025?

description.p0_npo: Flüüfff ASBL is a registered Belgian Non Profit Organisation with organisation number 0662.498.716 (see more on the Belgian Crossroads Bank for Enterprises Database).
description.p1_admins: The administrators of the NPO are Kenzo Warrens, Kenzo Duquenoy, Wybren van der Meer, Jan Taverniers and Benoît Volckaert.

npo.revenue: All the revenue made during the event will either be entirely used in equipment and services, to improve the next edition, or given to charity.
npo.title: Flüüfff ASBL

previous_editions.title: Where can I find the site of the previous editions?

rules.description: You can find the convention rules here.
rules.title: Are there certain rules at the convention?

content.title: Sea Life
content.subtitle: We are thrilled to announce our partnership with SEA LIFE Blankenberge for this year's charity efforts. SEA LIFE Blankenberge, nestled in the same charming seaside town as where Flüüfff began its journey, is an aquatic zoo dedicated to marine conservation and education. Together we can make a positive impact on our oceans and its inhabitants.
content.paragraph1: SEA LIFE Blankenberge, part of the Merlin Entertainments Group, has been a beacon of marine conservation since its inception in 1995. With over 2,500 fascinating aquatic creatures housed in thematic aquariums, Sea Life Blankenberge offers an immersive experience for visitors of all ages. From Humboldt penguins to small-clawed otters, the diversity of marine life is awe-inspiring.
content.paragraph2: One of the standout features of SEA LIFE Blankenberge is its seal rehabilitation center, established in 1998. Over the years, the center has rescued and rehabilitated more than 400 seals, providing them with essential care before releasing them back into the wild. The dedication of the SOS Rescue Team ensures that sick and injured seal pups have a fighting chance at survival.
content.paragraph3: Beyond its rescue efforts, SEA LIFE Blankenberge is committed to marine conservation on a global scale through its association with SEA LIFE Trust. The Trust envisions a world where our oceans are healthy, protected, and teeming with diverse life. By supporting SEA LIFE Blankenberge, you are contributing to this vision and helping safeguard the future of our oceans.
content.paragraph4: This year, for the first time, SEA LIFE and Flüüfff are putting their hands together to inform people and collect money for the seal rehabilitation center in Blankenberge! Our mutual goal is to collect enough money to rehabilitate at least one lovely sea creature that found its way to our Belgium shores.
content.paragraph5: Visit our panels, booth and fun games at the convention to learn more about how you can contribute and be a part of this impactful initiative.
content.paragraph6: Together, let's make waves for marine conservation!

Charity.more_info: More info about Sea Life can be found here.

header.title: Schedule
header.subtitle: All the events in one place!

idea.title: Host your own panel!
idea.description: You can host your own panel at Flüüfff, be it about something you like, or something you know a lot about. You can suggest a panel or a meet through the panel proposal form!

schedule.not_available: The schedule is not available at the moment

nsfw.name: NSFW
nsfw.description: The event depicts elements or themes which are connected to fetishes or related topics, however this event is still strictly non-sexual and no nudity is shown.

workshop.name: Workshop
workshop.description: The event asks for active participation (in contrast to passively listening to a presentation).

educational.name: Educational
educational.description: The event is either given by a (semi-)professional, or is the result of profound research and is aimed at informing/teaching about a subject.

fursuit-friendly.name: Fursuit-friendly
fursuit-friendly.description: The event either features special amenities for fursuiters (e.g., fans and/or a water station) or has measures in place to make some more accesible for fursuiters (e.g., slower paced than usual or with modified equipment to allow fursuiters to handle it).

sporty.name: Sporty
sporty.description: The event asks for a certain level of movement. Appropriate clothing, a water bottle and a towel are advised.

charity.name: Charity
charity.description: The event is planned and/or executed in cooperation with our chosen Charity organisation.

open-door.name: Open Door Event
open-door.description: The event can be entered and left at any given time during its duration.

question.title: Got a question?
question.description: Feel free to send us a message through the contact the form below!

description.p0: The best way to enjoy the convention to its full potential is with a residential ticket!
description.p1: Please note that Double and Twin room prices listed here are for ONE spot in a shared bedroom and ONE convention fee. Reserving an entire room is possible, but for double the price.
description.p2: Due to limited availability, the Triple (3 person) and Quadruple (4 person) bedrooms are only available to be reserved as the FULL bedroom, including all convention fees.

info.check_in_out:
Check-in on your first day is at 16:00.
Check-out on the last day is at 12:00.
info.room_types: Info about the different room types can be found on the rooms page. This year we offer Single, Double/Twin (2 persons), Triple (3 persons) and Quadruple (4 persons) bedrooms.
info.extra_days: You can add an extra day before and after the convention, called “early arrival” and “late departure” respectively.

day.title: Day ticket
day.description: Do you want to experience our fluffy event but have no need for accommodation? We have just the thing for you! We offer convention tickets for any given day, the full event, or weekend tickets.
day.sales_open_later: Note: Day ticket sales will open in Summer.
day.events_on_chosen_day: Access to all events of the chosen day(s)
day.info: Please note that day tickets allow you to stay from the first planned event, until the end of the last one.

extras.title: Extras
extras.description: Do you like our event and want to support Flüüfff to ensure we can keep on improving your experience in the future? Consider becoming a sponsor!

description.p0: This year's hotel is the awesome Bedford Hotel in Brussels!
description.p1: It's a stone's throw away from the Brussels centre, the station, a ton of food places, and the vibrant, glorious, shiny nightlife.
description.p2: We're excited to welcome you, we're excited to have you! We're excited to be taken out to dinner by you and...
description.p3: Oh, I got carried away. Welcome!

description.p0: Dine in style and at its finest in the Magellan Restaurant. There is seating for 240 guests and the restaurant is divided into a buffet and “à la Carte” restaurant to serve a wide range of tastes and dietary needs. All ingredients are from suppliers in the surrounding area.
description.p1: The hotel’s restaurant is a super nice area, with good food for decent prices!

surroundings.title: Low Budget
surroundings.description: There are many nice food places nearby, if you’re out on a walk.

food.kebab: There's two nice kebab places (one on each side of the road) within 5 minutes of walking out the hotel front door (go left!).
food.pasta: There’s a very recommended pastabar a little ahead. A good option is the spicy pasta with extra cheese!
food.vietnamese: If the spicy pasta isn’t exotic enough for you, there’s a vietnamese corner on the end of the street if you keep walking left.
food.mcdonalds: And if you’re a tasteless animal, you can go to a McDonald's. It’s only a 10 minute walk.

standard_rooms.title: Standard rooms
standard_rooms.description: All Standard rooms are stylish and offer a range of amenities. They are available as Single, Double, or Twin for 1, 2, 3, or 4 people.
standard_rooms.dry_cleaning: Same day dry cleaning and laundry (weekdays only)
standard_rooms.fitness_centre: Free access to the fitness centre
standard_rooms.soft_duvets: Comfortable beds with white soft duvets

header.title: Getting There
header.subtitle: How do I get to the hotel?

train.title: By train
train.actual_timetables: All travel instructions and actual timetables for the train system (depending on your location) can be found on the

car.title: By car
car.lez: The hotel is located in the center of Brussels, which means you have to cross the LEZ (Low Emission Zone). This means that older cars, diesel cars, and other very polluting cars can’t enter the city. Registration is mandatory for all vehicles registered abroad (except for vehicles registered in The Netherlands). Not doing so can lead to big fines (350 euros). More info at
car.parking: The parking at the hotel is called Parking Panorama and is owned by the city. Normal price is €16, but Flüüfff attendees can go for €13 per day. Ask for the reduction at the hotel reception! Parking spots are very tiny and the parking isn’t that big!

notice.rules: Safe travels! Be sure to check out the driving rules of Belgium, they can be quite complicated! Good luck!
notice.speed_limits:
Urban speed limit for Belgium is 50kph.
Rural speed limit for Flanders is 70kph.
Rural speed limit for Wallonia is 90kph.
